## Useful coding club tutorials    

Before completing the GLS tutorial, I recommend you are confident with the material covered in the following tutorials:    


* https://ourcodingclub.github.io/tutorials/modelling/  (Covers linear models and statistical assumptions)

* https://ourcodingclub.github.io/tutorials/data-scaling/  (Covers linear models and statistical assumptions)

* https://ourcodingclub.github.io/tutorials/datavis/  (Covers ggplot syntax)
